definition: Barack Obama (1961-), US Democrat politician, president 2009-2017
obscure/mysterious
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Obama's daughters are not to get "swine flu" jabs because of risk.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马的女儿们基于风险，不要猪流感刺戳。

sentences.english: West Virginians also don't like Mr Obama.
sentences.chinese: 西弗吉尼亚人不喜欢奥巴马。

sentences.english: For Obama Sr. this was an issue of national autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 在老奥巴马看来，这事关民族自主。

sentences.english: Barack Obama says his 86-year-old grandmother has died.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉克奥巴马表示他86岁的祖母去世了。

sentences.english: He faces an uphill battle against either Obama or Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 他将面对与奥巴马或者希拉里的升级选战。

sentences.english: But Mr Obama also has a lot to prove.
sentences.chinese: 但是奥巴马先生也须做大量努力来证明自己。

sentences.english: Obama! What do you think of Obama, my American friends?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎么看我们美国的友人奥巴马的？

sentences.english: Federal authorities are now saying a possible assassination plot against Barack Obama posed no credible threat.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府称可能对奥巴马的刺杀阴谋只是一场虚惊。

sentences.english: Mr Obama's agricultural policies also resonate beyond rural counties.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马的农业政策同样在农业县外引发共鸣。

sentences.english: Being a friend and colleague of Barack, I just called him 'that one.'
sentences.chinese: 我是作为奥巴马的朋友和同事才称他为‘那一位’的。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama has struck a mollifying note with China.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马先生对中国政策有所缓和。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama did not weigh in on the charges of vote-rigging.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马没有对诈选指控表示他的观点。

sentences.english: Why is Obama flying to Stansted?
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马为什么飞到斯坦斯特机场？

sentences.english: As the United States suffers under Obamanomics , China prospers under Capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 美国在奥巴马经济下受苦，中国在资本主义下繁荣。

sentences.english: President Obama and Prime Minister Rudd also discussed climate change, with Mr.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统与陆克文总理还讨论了气候变化问题。

Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
